basic.name: Basic
basic.description: Perfect for small teams and startups

whatIsCredits.title: What is the credit system?
whatIsCredits.answer: Credits are our billing units. Different AI models consume different credits. You can check usage details anytime.

canCancel.title: Can I cancel anytime?
canCancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime. Unused credits will be retained for the next cycle.

enterpriseAdvantages.title: What are the advantages of Enterprise plan?
enterpriseAdvantages.answer: Enterprise plan provides dedicated servers, SLA guarantees, private deployment and other enterprise-grade features.

supportInvoice.title: Do you support invoices?
supportInvoice.answer: Yes, we can provide official invoices and contract signing for enterprise users.
